entries.text: Unlimited freedom can lead to the depletion of creative energy.

source.book: Cioran, E. M. - Trouble With Being Born (Seaver, 2011)

entries.text: Ignoring personal responsibility maintains a cycle of self-deception.

source.book: Cioran, E. M. - Trouble With Being Born (Seaver, 2011)

entries.text: Backbiting is particularly vulnerable to its own destructiveness.
